name: Royal Bride Wedding MakeUp
description:
See wan't to help for her wedding. So are you ready for this? Make beautiful and gorgeous look and show how creative you can be withs cloths and makeup.

At the beginning of the game start to apply spa treatment, Massage on face with different cream and scrubs, wash face using shower, makeover, dress up, And also her husband dress up.

Features:
=======
- HD stunning graphics.
- There are so many different tools and different levels.
- Supported all device.
- Easy to play.

So are you ready for help? Play and Enjoy....
